description.raw:
First version of the lost person controller. Courtesy of BYU.

 @dnorth2 Notice that I've made the following changes:

* Your lost person controller is now compiled and install it when you compile and install the main swarm libraries. It's no longer living in the `example` directory anymore. From now on, you should work on the files located in `include/swarm/LostPersonControllerPlugin.hh` and `src/LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc`.

* I removed some warnings in the code. Take a look at `LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc:256` too. I added a `return 0` to make sure that the function always return an integer. Please, review if that's correct.

From now on, you should work on the files located in include/swarm/LostPersonControllerPlugin.hh and src/LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc.

  • I removed some warnings in the code. Take a look at LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc:256 too. I added a return 0 to make sure that the function always return an integer. Please, review if that's correct.
